News

Connexta, LLC Alliance Release Version 1.1.8 Now Available

Connexta is pleased to announce, the latest version of Alliance is available for download on Github. Alliance extends the (Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance (ISR) capabilities of DDF and integrates out-of-the-box with many known ISR data formats and Service interfaces. Release date: 9 April 2019, and release version number 1.1.8. Download is available from Alliance version 1.1.8 release.
